home_page_subtitle: Transform your ever-changing Garmin Live-Tracking link into a persistent URL and ensure continuous updates with built-in activity start notifications for your friends and family.
hiw_create_your_link_text: When you create your own personal persistent LiveTrack link, we give you a dedicated contact to add to your phone — it contains an email address that connects to our service.
hiw_set_in_garmin_app_text: In the Garmin Connect™ app, you add our contact as a recipient for your LiveTrack sessions. That way, whenever you start LiveTrack, Garmin will send the tracking email to us.
hiw_we_handle_the_link_title: We handle the link for you
hiw_we_handle_the_link_text: Every time your start a LiveTrack session, Garmin sends us a link, our service catches it, updates your personal page, and makes sure it always shows the newest link.
hiw_share_once_done_forever_text: Instead of sending your friends a new link every ride, just share your personal static URL once. They can bookmark it — it will always point to your most recent LiveTrack.
gs_follow_those_steps: Follow those steps to setup your persistent LiveTrack link with your Garmin device.
gs_create_a_livetrack_recipient_text: For Garmin to notify us when you start a LiveTrack session, we need you to add us as recipient for your LiveTrack.
gs_scan_or_download_contact: First, scan or download this contact card that contains a dedicated recipient email address.
gs_set_it_in_garmin_connect_text: In the Garmin Connect™ app, add our contact as an email recipient for your LiveTrack sessions. That way, whenever you start LiveTrack, Garmin will send the tracking email to us.
gs_heres_a_video: Here's a video showing you how to do this:
gs_turn_on_auto_start_text:
It is recommended that you turn on Auto Start from the Garmin Connect™ app's LiveTrack menu. This way, your tracking link here is automatically updated, without you needing to manually start a LiveTrack session.

Beware, while LiveTrack is active on your Garmin device, it consumes more battery on both your phone and Garmin device.
link_setup_we_received_notice: We received notice of your new activity, you're good to go!
link_setup_preview_your_latest_activity: You can preview your latest activty in the
link_setup_waiting_for_activity: We're waiting for you to start a new activity
link_setup_start_new_activity: Start a new activity on your Garmin device and start the LiveTrack session from your Garmin Connect™ app to verify that you set it up correctly.
ma_restricted_description: Only people with explicit access can open your LiveTrack.
ma_anyone_with_the_link_description: Anyone on the internet with the link can view your LiveTrack.
ma_people_with_access_text: The list of users with explicit access to your LiveTrack. If your link access is restricted, only those listed below that have been approved will be able to access your LiveTrack.
followers_issue_loading: There was an issue loading followers.
followers_permanently_or_temporarily: Do you want to permanently or temporarily {action} access?
no_livetrack_link_setup_yet: You don't have a LiveTrack link setup yet.
visits_issue_loading: There was an issue loading visits.
following_text: The list of users you are following or sent a follow request to. If their link access is restricted, your follow request will need to be approved in order to access their LiveTrack.
following_issue_loading: There was an issue loading users you follow.
following_unfollow_text: You will no longer be able to access their tracking link if it is private and will no longer receive notifications when they start an activity.
toggle_notifications_tooltip: Get notified about when this user starts a new activity.
notifications_text: You can either choose to receive email notifications, push notifications on your browser or none at all. Push notifications on your browser are per-device. If you want to receive them on both your computer and phone, make sure to enable them on both devices via this page.
notifications_follow_request_title: When someone wants to follow you
notifications_new_activity_title: When someone you follow starts a new LiveTrack session
verify_email_text:
We've sent an email to {email} to verify your email address and activate your account.
Verifying your email adresse will let you activate email notifications and reset your password in case you lose it.
enable_notifications_text: Push notifications on this browser are not enabled yet. You can only receive push notifications on this device if you enabled notifications.
user_email_address_not_set: User email address is not set
user_with_email_already_exists: A user with this email address already exists
new_verify_link_sent: A new verify link was sent to your email.
failed_to_set_preferred_locale: Failed to set user preferred locale
tracking_link_does_not_exist: This tracking link does not exist.
tracking_link_is_not_public: This tracking link is not public.
livetrack_session_not_started: This LiveTrack session has not started yet.
access_request_pending_approval: Your access request is pending approval.
token_invalid_or_expired: Token is invalid or has expired
invalid_action_token: Token does not allow this action
oauth_state_invalid_or_expired: OAuth state is invalid or has expired
sign_in_text: Enter your credentials below to sign in to your account
delete_account_text: This action cannot be undone. This will delete your account and all associated data.
sign_up_text: Enter your email and password below to create a new account
recover_account_text: Enter your email below and we will send you an email to reset your password
email_verification_success_text: Your email address was successfully verified. You can now close this page.
email_verification_error_text: Your email address couldn't be verified. {message}
reset_password_text: Create a new pasword for your account
mail_reset_password_p1: You requested to recover your password.
mail_reset_password_p2: If you think this is a mistake please notice the platform administrator.
mail_reset_password_click_get_new_one: Click here to get a new one
mail_reset_password_p3: You're receiving this email because a password reset was requested for your account.
mail_verify_email_p1: To activate your account, we just need to verify your email address:
mail_verify_email_p2: This will let you receive notifications and password resets from {appName}.
mail_verify_email_p3: You're receiving this email because you recently created an account at
mail_verify_email_p4: If it wasn't you, please ignore this email.
mail_new_follow_request_p1: Approving this will allow them to access your LiveTrack and receive notifications when you start an activity.
mail_new_follow_request_p2: You can manage access to your link and see your follow requests in your {tab} tab:
mail_new_activity_p1: You're receiving this email because you enabled notifications for {username}. You can manage notifications in your {label} tab.
mail_trouble_clicking_button: If you're having trouble clicking the "{button}" button, copy and paste the URL below into your web browser:
notif_new_follow_request_body: You can review follow requests in your account.
app_footer_notice_text: This service is in no way related to Garmin® but extends and simplifies the use of its LiveTrack feature.
